name: Blog Website
description: This is a blog website built using Laravel framework. It is a simple blog where users can create their account, create blog posts, edit and delete existing posts.
features: User authentication, User registration, Blog post creation, Blog post editing, Blog post deletion, Comment creation
technologies: Laravel, PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap

name: E-commerce Website
description: This is an e-commerce website built using Laravel framework. It is a simple online store where users can create their account, add products to cart, checkout, edit and delete existing products.
features: User authentication, User registration, Product creation, Product editing, Product deletion, Shopping cart, Checkout
technologies: Laravel, PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Stripe

name: To-Do List App
description: This is a simple to-do list app built using React framework. It is a simple app where users can add, edit and delete to-do items.
features: User authentication, User registration, To-do item creation, To-do item editing, To-do item deletion

name: Weather App
description: This is a simple weather app built using React framework. It is a simple app where users can view the current weather and forecast.
features: User authentication, User registration, Weather data display, Weather data refresh

name: Quiz App
description: This is a simple quiz app built using React framework. It is a simple app where users can answer questions and view the results.
features: User authentication, User registration, Quiz question creation, Quiz question editing, Quiz question deletion, Quiz result display

name: Task Management App
description: This is a simple task management app built using Laravel framework. It is a simple app where users can add, edit and delete tasks.
features: User authentication, User registration, Task creation, Task editing, Task deletion
technologies: Laravel, PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap

name: Job Search App
description: This is a simple job search app built using React framework. It is a simple app where users can search for jobs and view the job details.
features: User authentication, User registration, Job search, Job details display

name: Image Gallery App
description: This is a simple image gallery app built using Laravel framework. It is a simple app where users can upload, edit and delete images.
features: User authentication, User registration, Image upload, Image editing, Image deletion
technologies: Laravel, PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap

name: Chat App
description: This is a simple chat app built using React framework. It is a simple app where users can send messages to each other.
features: User authentication, User registration, Chat messaging, Chat message display

name: Forum App
description: This is a simple forum app built using Laravel framework. It is a simple app where users can create topics, reply to topics, edit and delete existing topics.
features: User authentication, User registration, Topic creation, Topic editing, Topic deletion, Reply creation
technologies: Laravel, PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap
